prompt:
Describe a situation where you had to explain a difficult concept in a simple way.
I was at a party with friends and family who didn't speak my language very well. I wanted to tell them about some new technology that I had been working on, but they couldn't understand what I said because they didn't know any technical terms related to it. So I decided to explain it in a way that they could understand: "Imagine if you could send messages through the air without using a phone or computer. That's kind of what this new technology does."
